mapper.insert: insert into `GROUPS`(USER_ID, NAME, INTRO, PUBLISHED_DATE) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{intro}, now())
mapper.select: select * from GROUP_MEMBERS inner join USERS U on GROUP_MEMBERS.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE GROUP_ID = #{id}
select G.*, U.NAME "ownerName" from USERS U, `GROUPS` G where U.ID = G.USER_ID and exists(select GROUP_ID from GROUP_MEMBERS GM where GM.GROUP_ID = G.ID AND USER_ID = #{id})
